content.rendered:
Cabo Verde Airlines, previously branded TACV Cabo Verde Airlines, is a scheduled, passenger and cargo airline based in Praia, Cape Verde. It is the national flag carrier of Cape Verde, operating flights to Europe, North America and South America. Its main base is Amilcar Cabral International Airport with a smaller one at Praia International Airport. Cabo Verde Airlines is also a ground handling company serving all airports in Cape Verde

 Queries handled Cabo Verde Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. TACV Club

List of Cabo Verde Airlines Offices :

Brazil – Gsa Recife
Brazil – Gsa Fortaleza
Brazil – Gsa Salvador
Brazil – Fortaleza
Cape Verde – Direccao De Operacoes De Voo
Cape Verde – Direccao De Manutencao E Engenharia
Cape Verde – Direccao Comercial
Cape Verde – Departamento De Vendas & Distribuicao
Cape Verde – Departamento De Marketing
Cape Verde – Santiago
Cape Verde – Delegacao Regional Norte
Cape Verde – Delegacao Regional Central
Cape Verde – Agencia Santiago
Cape Verde – Agencia Sal
France – Paris
Italy – Milao
Netherlands – Aata
Portugal – Loja Aeroporto / Escala De Lisboa
Portugal – Gsa Carga Portugal – Capitol Int
Portugal – Delegacao Sede Lisboa
United States – Boston

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Cabo Verde Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Cabo Verde Airlines : (click on the stars below)
